success.available: You are eligible for daily Group Finder rewards! Go queue up!

success.confirmation: You have been placed in the Group Finder queue\.
success.leader: You are the party leader\. Whisper me '!start' to begin!

success.dungeonList: You are queued for the following dungeons: (?<dungeons>.*)
success.waitTime: You've been waiting in the Group Finder queue for (?:(?<hours>\d+) hours, )?(?:(?<minutes>\d+) minutes, and)?(?<seconds>\d+) seconds\.
success.lastFormed: The last group was formed (?:(?<hours>\d+) hours, )?(?:(?<minutes>\d+) minutes, and)?(?<seconds>\d+) seconds ago\.

error.alreadyCast: Your line is already cast! I'm sure a fish'll be along soon\.{3}
error.alreadyHooked: Something's already bit your line! Quick, type !catch to snag it!

success.confirmation: You cast your line out into the water\.

success.tournament: You caught a (?<length>\d+(?:\.\d+)?) inch, (?<weight>\d+(?:\.\d+)?) pound (?<fish>\w+(?: \w+)*) worth (?<points>[0-9]+) points! You are in (?<rank>[0-9]+)[a-z]{2} place with (?<total>[0-9]+) total points\.
success.tournamentLegacy: You caught a (?<fish>\w+(?: \w+)*) worth (?<points>[0-9]+) points! You are in (?<rank>[0-9]+)[a-z]{2} place with (?<total>[0-9]+) total points\.
success.newRecord: This is the biggest (?<fish>\w+(?: \w+)*) you've ever caught\!
success.confirmation: Congratulations! You caught a (?<length>\d+(?:\.\d+)?) inch, (?<weight>\d+(?:\.\d+)?) pound (?<fish>\w+(?: \w+)*)!

error.empty: You don't have any fish! Type !cast to try and fish for some!
You haven't caught any fish yet!

success.size: You've caught (?<size>\d+) different types of fish:
success.details: Type !fish # for more information on the particular type of fish\.

error.empty: You don't have any fish! Type !cast to try and fish for some!

success.confirmation: You released your (?<fish>\w+(?: \w+)*)\. Bye bye!
Bug report submitted\.
Class distribution for the Wolfpack RPG:

error.notFound: You don't have any coins yet! Stick around during the livestream to earn coins\.

error.invalidOperation: You don't have any XP yet! Hang out in chat during the livestream to earn XP & coins\.

success.classLevel: You are a Level (?<level>\d+) (?<className>\w+), and you are Prestige Level (?<prestige>\d+)\. \(Total XP: (?<experience>\d+) \| XP To Next Level: (?<toNext>\d+)\)
success.level: You are Level (?<level>\d+) \(Total XP: (?<experience>\d+) \| XP To Next Level: (?<toNext>\d+)\)

topicList.response: Here's a list of things you can ask me about: (?<topics>[^\(]+ \(\d+\)(?: - [^\(]+ \(\d+\))*)

success.confirmation: Did you know you gain experience by watching the stream? You can level up as you get more XP! Max level is 20\. To check your level & xp, message me '!xp' '!level' or '!stats'\. Only Level 2\+ viewers can post links\. This helps prevent bot spam!

error.noRoles: You are not a member of any roles\.

roles.response: You are a member of the following roles?: (?<roles>.*)

error.invalidOperation: You either don't have coins or xp yet\. Hang out in chat during the livestream to earn them!

success.confirmation: Wolfcoins are a currency you earn by watching the stream! You can check your coins by whispering me '!coins' or '!stats'\. To find out what you can spend coins on, message me '!shop'\.

error.full: (?<name>.{1,16}) is full and doesn't need to eat!

success.confirmation: You were charged (?<cost>\d+) wolfcoins to feed (?<name>.{1,16}) the (?<sparkly>sparkly )?(?<pet>.*?)\. They feel refreshed!

error.syntax: Invalid number of parameters\. Syntax: !release <stable ID>

error.userNotFound: You have no coins to respec with\.
error.invalidOperation: You can't respec while in a party!

pending.warning: You've chosen to respec your class! It will cost you (?<cost>\d+) coins to respec and you will lose all your items\. Reply '(?<cancelCommand>\w+)' to cancel or one of the following codes to select your new class:

error.userNotFound: User does not exist in database\. You were charged no coins\.

success.classLevel: (?<user>[^ ]+) is a Level (?<level>\d+) (?<className>\w+) \((?<experience>\d+) XP\), Prestige Level (?<prestige>\d+), and has (?<coins>\d+) Wolfcoins\.
success.cost: It cost you (?<cost>\d+) Wolfcoins to discover this information\.
success.level: (?<user>[^ ]+) is Level  (?<level>\d+) \((?<experience>\d+) XP\) and has (?<coins>\d+) Wolfcoins\.

fishing.newRecord: (?<user>[^ ]+) just caught the heaviest (?<name>\w+) ever! It weighs (?<weight>\d+(?:\.\d+)?) pounds!
fishing.gotAway: Heck\! The fish got away\. Maybe next time\.{3}
fishing.tournamentStart: A fishing tournament has just begun! For the next (?<duration>[0-9]+) minutes, fish can be caught more quickly & will be eligible for leaderboard recognition! Head to https:\/\/tinyurl\.com\/PlayWolfpackRPG and type !cast to play!
fishing.tournamentEnd: The fishing tournament has ended! Out of (?<participants>[0-9]+) participants, (?<winner>.*) won with (?<points>[0-9]+) points!

party.groupDisbanded: The party leader \((?<user>[^ ]+)\) has left\. Your party has been disbanded\.
party.invitationInParty: (?<user>[^ ]+) tried to invite you to a group, but you are already in one! Type '!leaveparty' to abandon your current group\.
party.invitationInQueue: (?<user>[^ ]+) tried to invite you to a group, but you are queued in the Group Finder\. Type '!leavequeue' to leave the queue\.
party.invited: (?<user>[^ ]+), Level(?<level>\d+) (?<class>\w+), has invited you to join a party\. Accept\? \(y/n\)
party.promoted: (?<user>[^ ]+) has promoted you to Party Leader\.
party.ready: You've reached 3 party members! You're ready to dungeon!

pets.hungerCritical: (?<name>.{1,16}) the (?<sparkly>sparkly )?(?<pet>.*) is very hungry and will die if you don't feed it soon!
pets.hungerWarning: (?<name>.{1,16}) the (?<sparkly>sparkly )?(?<pet>.*) is hungry! Be sure to !feed them!
pets.dungeonFound: (?:You found your first pet! You now have a pet (?<name>.{1,16})\. Whisper me !pethelp for more info\.)|(You found a new pet buddy! You earned a (?<name>.{1,16}) pet!)
